name: HUMAN LIVE-HOW LONG CAN HUMAN BEINGS EXIST
name_original: HUMAN LIVE-HOW LONG CAN HUMAN BEINGS EXIST
description: HUMAN LIVE-HOW LONG CAN HUMAN BEINGS EXIST is a strategy game. There will be more than 50 kinds of disasters interrupt the earth’s general development. You need to click to upgrade technology trees and control disasters, try to reduce more damages and keep steady growth of population, grain and social security in a difficult balance.
